Hello World!

I am a full-stack developer with 2 years of experience, with a MERN stack focus. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and have a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end development.

I am eligible to work in Canada. Currently based in Vancouver, BC, I am open to relocation, offering a collaborative mindset to every team I work with.

Personal Projects

GymEnjoyer :
Fitness website that allows you to find the proper exercise for your training. With the help of great number of exercises, videos and recommendations, everyone can achieve their fitness goals easily.
TechnoGood :
E-commerce website specialized in electronic devices, offering a wide range of categories and products. Users can easily find and purchase the best gadgets to meet their needs.
TalkSphere :
Real-time chat application where users can register, join various chat rooms, stay connected and exchange messages in real time.
FoodFinder :
FoodFinder is a website designed to help users track nearby restaurants or find new places in any location. With options to add restaurants to your favorites and discover new spots, it connects food lovers with their favorite places and makes dining out easier.
HistoryTok :
History Tok is a React Native application featuring an infinite scroll of American history questions in a TikTok-like format.
